title: Up And Away
description: Arthur and the others find themselves being rescued off their smashed up meteor base by, a super hero! Yes the characters we all love have been thrust into the superhero dimension to defeat Lord D'ark again but also their evil selves from the alternate/anti-matter universe. They may not have super powers, (except Fawh) but they have gadgets and a gadget man to help them out. It is a bird, is it a plane or is it Arthur in his flying battlesuit!
author: Stephen Jennison-Smith
